title: Sidewall, ca. 1860
inscribed: Typed on paper and affixed to front lower right corner: "No. 1 from an upper chamber at the Prebble House, Richmond, Maine."
provenance: No. 1 from an upper chamber at the Prebble House, Richmond, Maine.
creditline: Gift of The Museum at The Fashion Institute of Technology
description: Stripe design, with diamond quatrefoils alternating with clusters of green triangles. Printed in white and green on a tuape satin ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sidewall, ca. 1860.
ca. 1860. Block-printed on machine-made paper. Gift of The Museum at The Fashion Institute of Technology. 1998-75-157.
